Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Drinking cup
Description: Drinking cup with fine-walled bitruncate body, straight rim and ring-shaped foot. The surface has a reddish coating and bears a painted decoration of white vertical stripes, demarcated in black, and a string of u-shaped lines of the same type encircling the piece in the upper half of the body. In the middle there are striations encircling the body.
